name: Beef Stir-Fry with Vegetables
description: A quick and flavorful stir-fry featuring beef, onions, and carrots, cooked in a savory sauce.
steps: Slice the beef into thin strips and marinate with salt, sesame oil, and red pepper powder.
Heat a pan over medium-high heat and add a teaspoon of cooking oil.
Add chopped garlic and thinly sliced onions, and sauté until the onions are translucent.
Add the marinated beef and cook until browned.
Add sliced carrots and stir-fry for an additional 5-7 minutes until the vegetables are tender.

name: Tomato and Tofu Stew
description: A hearty and nutritious stew combining tomatoes, tofu, and spices for a cozy meal.
steps: Cut the tofu into cubes and set aside.
In a pot, heat cooking oil over medium heat. Sauté chopped onions and garlic until fragrant.
Add diced tomatoes to the pot and cook until they break down, creating a sauce.
Stir in the tofu, salt, sugar, and red pepper powder, and simmer for about 15 minutes.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs if available.
